sentences.en: During the winter in Scandinavia, temperatures fall to 30 degrees below zero.
sentences.cn: 在冬季,斯堪的纳维亚的温度会降到零下30度.

sentences.en: Finland and Iceland are sometimes considered part of Scandinavia.
sentences.cn: 芬兰和冰岛有时被认为也包括在这一地区.

sentences.en: He travelled about Scandinavia in a small boat, stopping at small cities along the coast.
sentences.cn: 他乘小船漫游斯堪的那维亚半岛, 在沿岸各小城停留.

sentences.en: In his room, Tom was spreading out a map of Scandinavia on the bed.
sentences.cn: 房间里，汤姆正将一张斯堪的纳维亚地图在床上铺开。

sentences.en: In Scandinavia , similar - minded children leave their shoes on the hearth.
sentences.cn: 在斯堪的那维亚, 有着同样愿望的孩子们会把鞋子放在壁炉上.
它从斯堪的纳维亚一直伸展到法国.

sentences.en: Observational evidence of rapid chlorine activation by mountain waves above northern Scandinavia.
sentences.cn: 斯堪的钠维亚北部上面山波时快速氯化作用的观测证据.

sentences.en: Scandinavia boasts three countries that top most league tables for competitiveness.
sentences.cn: 北欧三国一直在全球竞争力座次表上位列三甲.

sentences.en: Scandinavia refers to Denmark, Norway, Sweden and Iceland.
sentences.cn: 斯堪的那维亚是指丹麦 、 挪威 、 瑞典和冰岛.

sentences.en: Scandinavia's citizens also live long lives, with average life expectancy of 79.
sentences.cn: 斯堪的纳维亚地区的居民寿命也更长, 平均寿命为79岁.

sentences.en: She has now accepted a posting as ambassador to Scandinavia.
sentences.cn: 她现在已接受任命,担任驻斯堪的纳维亚大使.

sentences.en: The colony became a haven for minority religious sects from Germany, Holland, Scandinavia, and Great Britain.
sentences.cn: 这里成为少数宗教支派者的天堂,来自德国 、 荷兰 、 北欧及大不列颠的人来此定居.

sentences.en: The vikings were a group of people whose ancestors came from Scandinavia.
sentences.cn: 北欧海盗的祖先来自斯堪的纳唯亚半岛.

sentences.en: The Vikings were a group of people whose ancestors came from Scandinavia.
sentences.cn: 北欧海盗来自于斯堪的纳维亚.

sentences.en: This was far more closely allied to Scandinavia than the rest of Germany.
sentences.cn: 这是之更加紧密的和斯堪的纳维亚同盟起来而被德国其他地区.

trans.tran_cn: 斯堪的纳维亚（半岛）（欧洲）
